sentences.english: We were tucked away in a secluded corner of the room.

sentences.english: The first fire puja to Bodhisattva Earth Treasure will be held on Nov. 23.

sentences.english: Though a thing may be small, don't selfishly hoard it.

sentences.english: There was another interesting version about Ksitigarbha Bodhisattva occupying land with his patchwork.

sentences.english: Earth Store Bodhisattva has great affinities with beings in Jambudvipa.
